WorkItem.Description:
http://www.wowhead.com/spell=44300/improved-crusader-strike
 
"Increases the damage dealt by your Crusader Strike ability by 5%." - Spell ID:44300 
 
I tried to add it to the items myself but it cant be done. There are various damage modifiers for DKs and other classes, I am sure it wont be hard to do it for Crusader Strike too. This is huge damage boost to CS especially combined with 2pc T12 set bonus.
WorkItem.Summary: [Retribution] Improved Crusader Strike Modifier Not implemented

Comments.Message: Got removed in our clean up, readded again. Still needs an update of the Item.
